column1: # This file contains an addendum to the MIME types in http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/httpd/httpd/trunk/docs/conf/mime.types
# which allows you to parse older MIME types and additional MIME types.
# If a MIME type or a file type extension in this file is contained in the Apache file
# from the Apache file is taken as the result. If more than one MIME type in this file points to the same file type extension
# or if the same MIME type points to different file type extensions
column2: the first entry is treated as standard.

column1: # application/octet-stream is the fallback value and don't need an entry.
# The data of this file comes from https://wiki.selfhtml.org/wiki/MIME-Type/%C3%9Cbersicht and own research in WIKIPEDIA.
# (Take one space character as separator.) The file type extension MUST NOT contain the period (".") and should be lowercase.
# A line MUST contain exactly one MIME type and one file type extension.

column2: which begin with the '#' character are treated as comments.
